ModMetaData.name: [KYD] JoyKind: Condensed
ModMetaData.author: Kayedon
ModMetaData.description:
<size=24>JoyKind: Condensed</size>
Combined version of all 5 JoyKind modules - Alcohol, Ambrosia, Caffeine, Smokeleaf, and Tobacco.
Adds each chemical as its own JoyKind, with a new JoyGiver, to separate them as a recreation item from drugs.
WARNING: These drugs no longer satisfies the Chemical need of Chemical Interest or Fascination.
